summary: This document is a timeline showing regular contact between Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorneys and SDNY prosecutors from July 2019 through 2020. It lists specific dates and types of interactions including meetings, phone calls, and emails.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the legal discussions between her defense attorneys and SDNY prosecutors.

persons.name: Pagliuca
persons.context: An SDNY prosecutor involved in discussions with Maxwell's defense attorneys on multiple dates.

persons.name: Everdell
persons.context: Maxwell's defense attorney who was in regular contact with SDNY prosecutors, participating in numerous meetings and calls.

persons.name: Cohen
persons.context: Another of Maxwell's defense attorneys who participated in meetings with SDNY prosecutors.

events.description: Cohen and Everdell meet with SDNY prosecutors at their offices.

events.title: Follow-up Meeting
events.description: Cohen and Everdell meet again with SDNY prosecutors.

events.title: Phone Calls with Prosecutors
events.description: Everdell has phone calls with SDNY prosecutors.

keyFacts: Maxwell's defense team was in regular, documented contact with SDNY prosecutors from at least July 2019 through 2020.
The interactions included in-person meetings at SDNY offices, phone calls, and emails.
Key defense attorneys involved were Everdell and Cohen, with prosecutor Pagliuca also frequently mentioned.
The timeline suggests ongoing negotiations or discussions in the pre-trial phase of Maxwell's case.
